basic.title: Basic Cleaning
intro: When you choose our services, we prioritize a thorough cleaning experience. Our system considers the overall size of your property, ensuring our cleaners have the resources and time for exceptional results.
We determine the scope of our service by assessing the number of bedrooms and bathrooms, tailoring our approach to your living space's layout and requirements.
Recognizing the uniqueness of every home and varying preferences, we offer flexibility to enhance your cleaning service with optional extras.
Our commitment extends beyond cleanliness; we prioritize your satisfaction. Whether it's a routine or detailed cleaning session, our goal is consistent – leaving your home spotless and welcoming.
basic.subtitle: Our general basic cleaning services include:

services.title: Kitchen:
details: Cleaning the exterior of the stove and oven;
Wiping down cabinet and appliance exteriors;

services.title: Bathroom:
details: Clean and sanitise the bathtub and recess;

basic.options: Change sheets and towels and put them in the laundry. Consult us for more information.

commercial.title: Commercial Cleaning
intro: If your company values ​​maintaining a good image for its customers and recognises the benefits of a good working environment for its employees, Focus Cleaning – Office Cleaning service is the ideal service for you.
For us the details are the difference to do well.
The cleaning methodology, the training of the staff and the quality of the products and equipment used allows us to achieve higher results than the competition and usually in less time.
In addition to cleaning, if desired, Focus Office Cleaning service can take care of the various logistical aspects of maintaining your office, such as the supply and replacement of consumables.
Ask us for a free quote and get to know in depth the Office Cleaning service we offer.
commercial.subtitle: Our general commercial cleaning services include:

services.title: General Areas:
details: Empty trash cans and replace lines;
Vacuum or sweep and mop the floors;

services.title: Restrooms:
details: Clean and disinfect toilets, sinks, and counters;
Refill soap, hand towels, and toilet paper;
Sweep or vacuum and mop floors.

services.title: Kitchen / Break Room:
details: Vacuum or sweep and mop floors;

services.title: Hallways / Common Areas:
details: Vacuum or sweep and mop floors;

construction.title: Construction Cleaning
intro: After construction of any size it is essential to remove dirt that is on the edges of floors, grouting basement and cement remnants that are scattered throughout the site.
Focus Cleaning is a company specialised in construction cleaning in Sydney.
We also include windows cleaning up to 3 levels. Affordable prices and excellent quality.
construction.subtitle: Our general construction cleaning services include:

services.title: Entrances & Exits:
details: Make sure all lights are working
Clean doors, door frames, and doorknobs

services.title: Living/Common Areas:
details: All lights are working and free of dust
Doorknobs and light switches are clean
Windows, window sills, and window tracks are cleaned and dusted
No evidence of paint drops on the floors or scuff marks on the walls

services.title: Kitchen:
details: Make sure all cabinet hardware is clean and secure
Clean windows, window sills and window tracks
Wipe down all fixtures and finishes

services.title: Bathrooms:
details: Sink, tub, shower are clean and sanitised
Mirrors, cabinets, and counters are wiped down
Inside cabinets and drawers are cleaned
Windows, baseboards, light fixtures, doorknobs and doorframes are cleaned

services.title: Bedrooms:
details: Dusting light fixtures and ceiling fans

endoflease.title: End of Lease Cleaning
intro: After construction of any size it is essential to remove dirt that is on the edges of floors, grouting basement and cement remnants that are scattered throughout the site.
Focus Cleaning is a company specialised in construction cleaning in Sydney.
We also include windows cleaning up to 3 levels. Affordable prices and excellent quality.
endoflease.subtitle: Our end of lease cleaning services include:

services.title: Bedrooms & Living Areas:
details: Thoroughly clean, dust, and wash the interior of the windows, windowsills, and ledges
Clean the insides of cupboards and built-in wardrobes
Conduct spot cleaning on walls, doors, and light switches to remove finger marks and scuff marks

services.title: Laundry:
details: Sink, tub, shower are clean and sanitised
Mirrors, cabinets, and counters are wiped down
Inside cabinets and drawers are cleaned
Windows, baseboards, light fixtures, doorknobs and doorframes are cleaned

services.title: Windows and sliding Doors:
details: Clean the interiors of glass surfaces and mirrors;
Clean both sides of sliding glass doors, including tracks and frames;

services.title: Balcony:
details: Vacuum and mop the floors. (Please note that complete stain removal on the balcony floor is not guaranteed, as we will make every effort to remove as much as possible.)
Perform dry and damp dusting of walls and skirting;

spring.title: Spring Cleaning
intro: Spring cleaning is a traditional practice involving deep and comprehensive cleaning, focusing not only on removing accumulated dirt and dust but also on organizing and discarding unnecessary items.

Cabinets are often the target of a thorough review. This practice not only enhances the hygiene and aesthetics of the home but can also have psychological benefits, providing a sense of renewal and well-being.

Furthermore, spring cleaning can create a healthier environment by removing allergens and promoting a lighter and more airy atmosphere. In summary, spring cleaning is a tradition beyond simple housekeeping, encompassing a comprehensive approach to revitalize the domestic space and promote a healthier and more pleasant environment.
spring.subtitle: Our spring cleaning services include:

mould.title: Mould Cleaning
intro: Our team efficiently remove mould from surfaces to enhance your living environment.
Whether on walls, window frames, bathroom or kitchen areas, we tackle mould to ensure your space becomes spotless but also comfortable and healthy.
Focus Cleaning is a company specialising in mould cleaning in Sydney.
mould.subtitle: Our mould cleaning services include:

services.title: Bedrooms & Living Areas:
details: Thoroughly clean, dust, and wash the interior of the windows, windowsills, and ledges.
Clean the insides of cupboards and built-in wardrobes with mould.
Conduct spot cleaning of baseboard, doors, and light switches.
Every single spot that you have mould in the room.

services.title: Bathroom:
details: All corners of the shower and bathroom with mould.

services.title: Laundry:
details: Mirrors, cabinets, and counters are wiped down.
Inside cabinets and drawers are cleaned.
Windows, baseboards, light fixtures, doorknobs and doorframes are cleaned.
